show_name: Cardcaptor Sakura The Movie 2: The Sealed Card
other_title: Card Captor Sakura film 2 : la carte scellée (French)
Sakura Card Captors - A Carta Selada (Portuguese)
Sakura, cazadora de cartas: La película 2 - La carta sellada (Spanish)
劇場版　カードキャプターさくら　封印されたカード (Japanese)
庫洛魔法使 被封印的卡片 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: All of the Clow Cards have been captured, and Sakura Kinomoto, the new Master of the Cards, is preparing to play the lead in the play for the town festival. However, a new evil force is causing mysterious events all over Tomoeda, including the disappearance of Sakura's cards. With Syaoran's help, Sakura must figure out the cause of these events, and save her town.
ending_theme: "Ashita e no Melody (Melody for Tomorrow)" by CHAKA
